titleStmt.title: The historie of Trebizond in foure bookes / by Tho. Gainsforde ...
titleStmt.author: Gainsford, Thomas, d. 1624?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Downes and Eph. Dawson,

notesStmt.note: Books 2-4 each has special t.p.: The second [-fourth] booke of the historie of Trebizond.
Item at reel 1832:60 imperfect: faded, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Item at reel 989:11 identified as STC 11521.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University Library.
